Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about solar energy and our services

For commercial and industrial installations, the typical payback period ranges from 3-5 years depending on your current electricity rates, system size, and available incentives. After payback, you enjoy free electricity for the remaining 20+ years of system life.
